title: Group portrait of women in ball gowns, front row from left: Mrs. Wilbur Douglas, Mrs. Forrest Parr, Mrs. Charles Angell, Mrs. Howard Hairston, Mrs. H. D. Primas Sr., Mrs. Gaines Bradford, Mrs. Lewis Jenkins; second row: Mrs. William Walker, Mrs. Arthur Stevenson, Mrs. Leroy Patrick, Mrs. Max Johnson, Mrs. John Cundieff, Mrs. Nathen Page, Ruth King, Mrs. William B. Miller, and Mrs. Oswald Mickens; last row: Mrs. Clifford McPherson, Mrs. William Nicholson, Miriam Sharpe Fountain, Mrs. Henry D. McCullough, Mrs. James Simmons, posed in the Georgian ballroom of Hotel Webster Hall with sign inscribed "Alpha Omicron Lambda 30th Anniversary" for the Alpha Phi Alpha 30th Anniversary Ball
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
